thread.title: Police searching for suspects in fatal Syracuse shooting
thread.title_full: Police searching for suspects in fatal Syracuse shooting - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Police searching for suspects in fatal Syracuse shooting
text:
SYRACUSE, N.Y. (AP) - Police in Syracuse are searching a 160-acre cemetery for suspects believed to be involved in a shooting that left a 15-year-old dead and another teen injured.
Authorities say officers responded to Hope Avenue Wednesday night after receiving a call of shots fired. They began following a vehicle and say the suspects fired at them several times.
The suspects then ditched their vehicle and ran into Oakwood Cemetery. A helicopter and K-9 units were then brought in to search.
At a house on Hope Avenue officers found a 15-year-old boy dead on the rear porch and a 17-year-old who'd been shot in the leg. He was treated at a hospital for non-life threatening injuries.
Nearby Syracuse University was briefly put on lockdown as a precaution. Normal activities have resumed.
